text: Control is the third studio album by American recording artist Janet Jackson. It was released on February 4, 1986, by A&M; Records. It was her first album after she had fired her father, Joseph Jackson as her manager. Since the album's release it has been certified platinum. It is one of her most known albums. It has sold over 14 million copies worldwide. ==Reviews== Control received positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1986 albums Category:Janet Jackson albums Category:Funk albums Category:New jack swing albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Control (Janet Jackson album)
